DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate a touch screen application designed to help pediatric patients with cerebral palsy communicate. The study will test how well patients type on two different tools: one tool is already on the market , and the second tool is a newly developed App.
DOC.brief_title: Data Acquisition Study for a Communication Device for Pediatric Patients With Cerebral Palsy
DOC.criteria: Patients between the ages of 7 years old 21 years old been diagnosed with spastic or dystonic diplegic or quadriplegic cerebral palsy. are able to communicate through written words are able to follow a 3 steps directions, and follow study directions and procedures.
